      • addUser

        public boolean addUser​(java.lang.String id,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Adds user to the table
        Parameters:
        id - this will be the value stored in the id column of the Database
        password - this value will be salted and hashed and stored in the salt and hash columns of the DB
        Returns:
        boolean if user exists or not

      • addProduct

        public boolean addProduct​(java.lang.String seller,
                          int price,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String description)
        Adds a product to the table
        Parameters:
        seller - this is the public key found in the wallets table of the seller of the product
        price - this is the amount of Wocoins a product costs.
        name - this is the name of the product.
        description - this is a user defined description of the product.
        Returns:
        whether or not the product was added.
